title: ftpd
author: mtheall, TuxSH
details: This is a port of ftpd for 3DS.\nTo use it, run the application and then connect to your Switch's IP with an ftp program on port 5000.
changelog:
2.3.1

Rebuild against latest toolchains
Further improvements to overall system stability and other minor adjustments have been made to enhance the user experience

2.3

New Supported Commands:
MLSD
MLST
SIZE
Other Features:
Switch support
Backlight toggle (Start button)
More compatibility with non-compliant clients
Further improvements to overall system stability and other minor adjustments have been made to enhance the user experience

2.2.0-947dc137
Show local IP address on Switch correctly.
